channel.title: Server IP?
channel.description:
Hey guys does anybody know how to make it so i can enter my server ip:? i just downloaded a new source... please help me.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/t4zpt1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Server IP?
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

Files: Gui.java, EGUI.java, client.java
Search keywords: 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, localhost, server =, serverip =

Read full topic

item.title: Server IP?
item.dc:creator: @bodya7 bodya7
item.description:
@bodya7 wrote:

[quote=“co pked, post:3, topic:381568”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=477381.msg3492741#msg3492741 date=1297045196]
Why not just edit the GUI so that the client connects to your server IP?
[/quote] lol… if i knew how to do that i would do it already but i dont know so can you tell me how to edit the file so it connects to my ip…[/quote]
you go into the file select notes with the file and search 127.0.0.1 and change it to what ur ip is

Read full topic
